elements.title: Erna P. Harris (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that African-American journalist Erna P. Harris (pictured) was called a "fearless critic" of the internment of Japanese Americans by the US government during World War II?

elements.title: he was influenced by his work (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that despite J. R. R. Tolkien's dislike of Shakespeare, he was influenced by his work?

elements.title: The Owl's Legacy (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the television series The Owl's Legacy was modelled after the ancient Greek symposium?

elements.title: James Danandjaja (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that James Danandjaja, an expert on Indonesian folklore and the pioneer of Indonesian folkloristics, also learned ballet and modern dance?

elements.title: Rick and Morty (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Rick and Morty caused McDonald's to bring back its Szechuan Sauce, twenty years after it was discontinued?

elements.title: Mario Kart: Super Circuit (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the release of Mario Kart: Super Circuit in China was cancelled because of excessive video-game piracy in the country?

elements.title: Constans II (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Constans II was a monk before he became a Roman emperor?

elements.title: rite (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the particular church to which one belongs determines the right rite and the use to use?
